svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - March 30 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
March 30, 2024" date: "2024-03-29"
Eth News and Links
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
• Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko & Christine Kim : Missed
slots : blocks gossiped with missing blobs, circuit breaker to local building not triggered, base fee
variability due to EIP1559 being block rather than time based bloXroute post mortem : resolved by
disabling propagation of blocks containing blobs via their distribution network State & history growth
: Paradigm research : history is 10x state growth Continue work on EIP4444 (history expiry) & provide
downloadable history so can stop serving on p2p Retroactive EIPs: agreed to include EIP7610 (revert
contract creation for non-empty storage) and EIP7523 (deprecate empty accounts) Pectra upgrade (small
fork targeting late 2024) EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas cost benchmarks Candidate for inclusion :
EIP7547 IL : design issue with account abstraction & options to mitigate Potential EIP updates (no
decisions yet, client teams to review, aim to decide scope at ACDE in 2 weeks) EIP5920 PAY opcode
EIP7609 decrease cost of TSTORE/TLOAD EIP2935 save historical block hashes in state EIP7545 Verkle
proof verification precompile EOF (Ethereum Object Format) RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile EIP7664
Access-Key opcode EIP6493 SSZ transaction signature scheme
Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko & Christine Kim :
• Missed slots : blocks gossiped with missing blobs, circuit breaker to local building not triggered,
base fee variability due to EIP1559 being block rather than time based bloXroute post mortem :
resolved by disabling propagation of blocks containing blobs via their distribution network
Missed slots : blocks gossiped with missing blobs, circuit breaker to local building not triggered,
base fee variability due to EIP1559 being block rather than time based
• bloXroute post mortem : resolved by disabling propagation of blocks containing blobs via their
distribution network
• State & history growth : Paradigm research : history is 10x state growth Continue work on EIP4444
(history expiry) & provide downloadable history so can stop serving on p2p
State & history growth :
• Paradigm research : history is 10x state growth
Paradigm research : history is 10x state growth
• Continue work on EIP4444 (history expiry) & provide downloadable history so can stop serving on p2p
Continue work on EIP4444 (history expiry) & provide downloadable history so can stop serving on p2p
• Retroactive EIPs: agreed to include EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) and
EIP7523 (deprecate empty accounts)
Retroactive EIPs: agreed to include EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) and
• Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas cost benchmarks
Candidate for inclusion : EIP7547 IL : design issue with account abstraction & options to mitigate
Potential EIP updates (no decisions yet, client teams to review, aim to decide scope at ACDE in 2
weeks) EIP5920 PAY opcode EIP7609 decrease cost of TSTORE/TLOAD EIP2935 save historical block hashes
in state EIP7545 Verkle proof verification precompile EOF (Ethereum Object Format) RIP7212 secp256r1
precompile EIP7664 Access-Key opcode EIP6493 SSZ transaction signature scheme
Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024)
• EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas cost benchmarks
EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas cost benchmarks
• Candidate for inclusion : EIP7547 IL : design issue with account abstraction & options to mitigate
Candidate for inclusion :
• EIP7547 IL : design issue with account abstraction & options to mitigate
• Potential EIP updates (no decisions yet, client teams to review, aim to decide scope at ACDE in 2
weeks)
• EIP5920 PAY opcode
EIP5920 PAY opcode
• EIP7609 decrease cost of TSTORE/TLOAD
EIP7609 decrease cost of TSTORE/TLOAD
• EIP2935 save historical block hashes in state
EIP2935 save historical block hashes in state
• EIP7545 Verkle proof verification precompile
EIP7545 Verkle proof verification precompile
• EOF (Ethereum Object Format)
EOF (Ethereum Object Format)
• RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile
RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile
• EIP7664 Access-Key opcode
EIP7664 Access-Key opcode
• EIP6493 SSZ transaction signature scheme
EIP6493 SSZ transaction signature scheme
• EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance): Breakout call video & notes Inactivity leak under
maxEB: ejection balance should remain as 16 ETH
EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance):
• Breakout call video & notes
Breakout call video & notes
• Inactivity leak under maxEB: ejection balance should remain as 16 ETH
Inactivity leak under maxEB: ejection balance should remain as 16 ETH
• EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists): Potuz: inclusion lists & EIP3074 incompatibilities
EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists):
• Potuz: inclusion lists & EIP3074 incompatibilities
Osaka + F starname upgrade (meta EIP7607 )
• Verkle: Implementers call video & notes Verkle from genesis devnet-5 live
• Implementers call video & notes
Implementers call video & notes
• Verkle from genesis devnet-5 live
Verkle from genesis devnet-5 live
This newsletter is sponsored by Pashov Audit Group !
What if you can get a good security review from elite security researchers without spending a single
penny ?
We offer a FREE pre-audit review on your code.
Our review will check for common vulnerabilities and suggest best practices to ensure that your
codebase will get the most out of an audit.
We bet that this free service is better than some that cost 5 figures on the market.
We will be offering this service forever, but if you ping in the following 72hrs after the newsletter
is out, you get a guaranteed high priority for reviewing your code. Reach out - t.me/pashovkrum
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 30.11% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 30.11% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 66% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 38% plurality Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth 66% majority
Execution layer: Geth 66% majority
• Consensus layer: Prysm 38% plurality
Consensus layer: Prysm 38% plurality
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
• Erigon++ : Silkworm (C++ block execution, RPC & p2p using evmone) running inside Erigon, enabled by
command line flag(s), experimental
Erigon++ : Silkworm (C++ block execution, RPC & p2p using evmone) running inside Erigon, enabled by
• MEV-Boost min-bid provides 7% of censorship resistance : changing to opt-out is simpler alternative
to inclusion lists
MEV-Boost min-bid provides 7% of censorship resistance : changing to opt-out is simpler alternative to
inclusion lists
Client Releases
• Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.1.3 : hotfix for duplicate lookup requests and to run fork choice
after all block imports Prysm v5.0.2 : optimizations, UX improvements & bug fixes; defaults to local
block if external builder less than 10% additional value Nimbus v24.3.0 : additional beacon API
support, reduces CPU usage & improves resilience; defaults to local block if external builder less
than 10% additional value Teku v24.3.1 : reduces CPU & bandwidth usage; defaults to local block if
external builder less than 10% additional value
Consensus layer:
• Lighthouse v5.1.3 : hotfix for duplicate lookup requests and to run fork choice after all block
imports
Lighthouse v5.1.3 : hotfix for duplicate lookup requests and to run fork choice after all block
• Prysm v5.0.2 : optimizations, UX improvements & bug fixes; defaults to local block if external
builder less than 10% additional value
Prysm v5.0.2 : optimizations, UX improvements & bug fixes; defaults to local block if external builder
less than 10% additional value
• Nimbus v24.3.0 : additional beacon API support, reduces CPU usage & improves resilience; defaults to
local block if external builder less than 10% additional value
Nimbus v24.3.0 : additional beacon API support, reduces CPU usage & improves resilience; defaults to
• Teku v24.3.1 : reduces CPU & bandwidth usage; defaults to local block if external builder less than
10% additional value
Teku v24.3.1 : reduces CPU & bandwidth usage; defaults to local block if external builder less than
• Execution layer: Erigon v2.59.2 : patch for MDBX size/performance regression introduced in v2.58.0
Reth v0.2.0-beta.4 : performance & storage improvements
Execution layer:
• Erigon v2.59.2 : patch for MDBX size/performance regression introduced in v2.58.0
Erigon v2.59.2 : patch for MDBX size/performance regression introduced in v2.58.0
• Reth v0.2.0-beta.4 : performance & storage improvements
Research
• Vitalik: extend anti-correlation incentives to support decentralized staking
Vitalik: extend anti-correlation incentives to support decentralized staking
• Out-of-protocol blob inclusion pre-confirmations to mitigate blob contention & censorship
Out-of-protocol blob inclusion pre-confirmations to mitigate blob contention & censorship
Layer 2
• Base gas target increased to 3.75mgas/s , planning increase to 5 mgas/s next week
Base gas target increased to 3.75mgas/s , planning increase to 5 mgas/s next week
• Polygon zkEVM outage : synchronizer didn’t detect mainnet reorg, emergency state approved by
Security Council to upgrade network
Polygon zkEVM outage : synchronizer didn’t detect mainnet reorg, emergency state approved by Security
Council to upgrade network
• Based sequencing & pre-confirmations call video & notes
Based sequencing & pre-confirmations call video & notes
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs: EIP7664 : Access-Key opcode Vitalik’s draft EIPs: Remove identity precompile Raise gas costs
of hash functions Remove bloom filters
EIPs:
• EIP7664 : Access-Key opcode
EIP7664 : Access-Key opcode
• Vitalik’s draft EIPs: Remove identity precompile Raise gas costs of hash functions Remove bloom
filters
Vitalik’s draft EIPs:
• Remove identity precompile
Remove identity precompile
• Raise gas costs of hash functions
Raise gas costs of hash functions
• Remove bloom filters
Remove bloom filters
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7660 : Release tokens on predefined periods ERC7661 : Extended
multiphase fractional NFTs ERC7662 : AI agent NFTs
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7660 : Release tokens on predefined periods
ERC7660 : Release tokens on predefined periods
• ERC7661 : Extended multiphase fractional NFTs
ERC7661 : Extended multiphase fractional NFTs
• ERC7662 : AI agent NFTs
ERC7662 : AI agent NFTs
Stuff for developers
• Remix v0.46.0 : defaults Remix VM EVM version to Cancun & Solidity compiler to v0.8.25
Remix v0.46.0 : defaults Remix VM EVM version to Cancun & Solidity compiler to v0.8.25
• BidDog (Solidity): auction managed AMM, AGPL-3.0
BidDog (Solidity): auction managed AMM, AGPL-3.0
• Gaslite Drop deploy ERC20 token using Bytecode20 ( currently can’t verify on Etherscan )
Gaslite Drop deploy ERC20 token using Bytecode20 ( currently can’t verify on Etherscan )
• web3.py WebSocketProvider in v7 beta
web3.py WebSocketProvider in v7 beta
• Lattice MUD v2 (game framework): adds Store (runtime defined storage) & World (contract framework)
Lattice MUD v2 (game framework): adds Store (runtime defined storage) & World (contract framework)
• Curta CTF number heist solution
Curta CTF number heist solution
• EthPandaOps Xatu dataset available in Parquet format for mainnet and Sepolia & Holešky testnets
EthPandaOps Xatu dataset available in Parquet format for mainnet and Sepolia & Holešky testnets
Security
• Munchables $62M exploit on Blast by rogue dev, funds returned to multisig
Munchables $62M exploit on Blast by rogue dev, funds returned to multisig
• Prisma Finance $11.6M exploit via unvalidated input, revoke delegate approvals
Prisma Finance $11.6M exploit via unvalidated input, revoke delegate approvals
• Curio $113k exploit on mainnet via flawed voting power access control
Curio $113k exploit on mainnet via flawed voting power access control
• Baseline on Blast vulnerability disclosed
Baseline on Blast vulnerability disclosed
Ecosystem
• Vitalik: Ethereum after blobs , L1 progress less disruptive for apps, scaling work in the
background, apps need to be built for 2020s Ethereum workflow (e.g. on L2, private & with account
abstraction)
Vitalik: Ethereum after blobs , L1 progress less disruptive for apps, scaling work in the background,
apps need to be built for 2020s Ethereum workflow (e.g. on L2, private & with account abstraction)
• EIP7503 (zk wormholes) explainer: mechanism for privacy-preserving transfers
EIP7503 (zk wormholes) explainer: mechanism for privacy-preserving transfers
• Hackathon projects: ETHTaipei & ETHSamba
Hackathon projects: ETHTaipei & ETHSamba
• Optimism Retro Funding (expanded from public goods) experimenting with impact juries & metrics based
evaluation for focused rounds: onchain builders, OP Stack, governance & dev tooling
Optimism Retro Funding (expanded from public goods) experimenting with impact juries & metrics based
Enterprise
• Google search for an address shows balance on Arbitrum One & OP Mainnet as well as mainnet
Job Listings
• Nethermind Mechanism Designer , Protocol Research Manager , Research Engineer
Nethermind Mechanism Designer , Protocol Research Manager , Research Engineer
• Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
• Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
• 🔥OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
🔥OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
• Waku is hiring! Protocol Engineer , Waku SDK Software Engineer & Researcher
Waku is hiring! Protocol Engineer , Waku SDK Software Engineer & Researcher
• IFT / Logos : ZK Researcher (Nomos); ZK Researcher (Vac) & ZK Engineer x2
IFT / Logos : ZK Researcher (Nomos); ZK Researcher (Vac) & ZK Engineer x2
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.2 to 105.5 gwei, with 26.5 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 22.6 gwei 3k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.2 to 105.5 gwei, with 26.5 gwei average
• Zero net issuance currently at 22.6 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.6 gwei
• 3k ETH net burn this week
3k ETH net burn this week
• ETHUSD : $3,303 - $3,664, currently $3,523
ETHUSD : $3,303 - $3,664, currently $3,523
• ETHBTC : currently 0.05 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.05 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
• Blobs being used for inscriptions, activating blob fee market
Blobs being used for inscriptions, activating blob fee market
• Splits multichain : single view of activity across mainnet & Layer 2
Splits multichain : single view of activity across mainnet & Layer 2
• Privacy & Scaling Explorations: Anon Aadhaar v2 adds selective disclosure & simplified nullifier
Privacy & Scaling Explorations: Anon Aadhaar v2 adds selective disclosure & simplified nullifier
• Crypto: The Game (onchain Survivor) season 2 starts April 2, players/jury represented as NFTs
Crypto: The Game (onchain Survivor) season 2 starts April 2, players/jury represented as NFTs
Regulation/business/tokens
• Alex Pertsev's 2 day trial completed in Netherlands, verdict expected May 14
Alex Pertsev's 2 day trial completed in Netherlands, verdict expected May 14
• SBF sentenced to 25 years
SBF sentenced to 25 years
• KuCoin charged with bank secrecy act & unlicensed money transmission offenses
KuCoin charged with bank secrecy act & unlicensed money transmission offenses
• Beba (apparel) sued SEC, claims free airdrop is not a securities transaction
Beba (apparel) sued SEC, claims free airdrop is not a securities transaction
• ETH correlation analysis in spot ETH ETF filing: strong correlation between spot & futures market
ETH correlation analysis in spot ETH ETF filing: strong correlation between spot & futures market
General
• Vitalik: memecoins for public goods & creating games/fun
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-march-30-2024
